UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial properties of membrane-active dodecapeptides derived from MSI-78.
Literature.Author: Monteiro C, Fernandes M, Pinheiro M, Maia S, Seabra CL, Ferreira-da-Silva F, Costa F, Reis S, Gomes P, Martins MC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=>512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>512µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(MIC=512->512µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=512µg/ml)
